title: Creating New Ranked Team (5v5) AUS
body:
Hello,

I am currently looking to form a team with a great bunch of people who are mature and competitive.
Requirements: Must be 18 years or older, must have access to voice communication (skype, mic), must be willing and interested to learn and improve and of course, have fun.

We are looking to be a fun team, but at the same time we'd still like to win. That said, we don't expect to reach high diamond, master or challenger, but we would still like to explore the team aspects of the game; things like building team compositions and strategies. We will also occasionally review our replays as a team and discuss the pros and cons of our play.

How to apply: Contact me IGNs - KINGOFTHRON3S I will play a few games with you, and see if we click.

Play Hard Pursue Victory!
KINGOFTHRON3S
